item.title: Embedding an HTTP server in Equinox
item.description:
I want to create a test server for my application. Using embedding Http server in equinox is my first option. I had experience using simple http service implementation of equinox, however I want to play with Jetty this time. Following the guide of Equinox server, I can't running a Jetty server with my servlet in Eclipse Indigo. Obviously the guide is out of date. After tuning it, I found below bundles are minimum collection to run Jetty inside OSGi runtime.
